pr_title: Bug 568152 - Use FrameworkUtil#getBundle instead of Platform#getBundle

timeline.message:
Bug 568152 - Use FrameworkUtil#getBundle instead of Platform#getBundle

From a performance view it is recommended to use
FrameworkUtil#getBundle() instead of Platform.getBundle() when a class
from the referred bunlde is accessible.

This change replaces the usage of the method for the generated
Executable Extension Factory.

Signed-off-by: Karsten Thoms <karsten.thoms@karakun.com>

timeline.bodyText: should we also check others in the class like org.osgi.framework.BundleContext
timeline.author: cdietrich

timeline.message:
Use class object for type references instead of QN

For classes that are on the generator's classpath anyway_
- org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource
- org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage
- org.osgi.framework.BundleContext

Signed-off-by: Karsten Thoms <karsten.thoms@karakun.com>
